name: Hope (itch) (krazune, Wafflus)
description:
Hope

This is a game about a detective that is investigating a mysterious disappearance. Use the telephone and the investigation documents to solve the case.

This game was created by @Krazune, and @IndieWafflus, in 72 hours, for the Ludum Dare 48.

Instructions

Click the telephone headset to pick up a call. Click the telephone numbers in the telephone's number pad to dial up a telephone number, and click the headset to make the call.

The calls tab will show you the call history.

The documents tab will show all the documents received from other characters.

You can check the contacts that have been discovered in the contacts list, and you can also click the numbers in the list to dial the number automatically.

Use the clues given by the calls, and documents to discover the next telephone numbers you have to call.

Known Bugs

Choosing the wrong option will make it so you need to restart the game (and get it correct next time) to continue.

WebGL version doesn't seem to work.

Third Party Assets

"Dogica" font, by Rob Mucci.

"Pixellari" font, by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante.

Public Source Code

All the files from the Unity project are available at the GitHub Repository.
